item.title: On Becoming a Learning Scientist
item.description: The learning sciences is a new field, evidenced by folks’ indecision around whether or not we capitalize the L and S of Learning Sciences.

item.title: On Being a Doctoral Student
item.description: Introduction Being and becoming: two–perhaps the two–central questions of Western [[philosophy]]. In [[On Becoming a Learning Scientist]] I write about what it’s felt like, and feels like, to be in the process of becoming.
